caption: This photograph depicts a group of young men playing baseball on a field. The players are seen in various baseball uniforms and positions, one of whom is mid-pitch, while others stand around or walk about the field. In the backdrop, a series of industrial structures emit large plumes of dark smoke into the sky, creating a stark contrast with the recreational activity in the foreground. The scene is enclosed by a chain-link fence, beyond which parked cars are visible. This juxtaposition highlights a sharp contrast between leisure activities and industrial environmental impacts.
title: Clark field baseball diamond and neighboring republic steel mill
